attributes.review: This app was touted as a lifestyle/fitness app and promised to be full of helpful, healthy tips. After creating my profile the app generated a 7 day cleanse that was supposed to be tailored to my specific health needs. Iâ€™m concerned because day one of my â€œpersonalized cleanseâ€ called for 500 mg of hydroxychloroquine for breakfast, 8 oz of Fresh Scent Lysol for lunch, and a 10 oz well done steak with ketchup for dinner. As an average American, Iâ€™m no genius, but I feel this isnâ€™t entirely legit. I decided to do some digging and it seems that this app is actually spam created by a Russian bot. 0 stars.
attributes.title: Harmful spam app

attributes.review: I was disappointed to say at the least. As soon as i opened the app it asked for my number.. not about that. Also the app sends about 50 notifications a day. It got to the point it started slowing down my phone. My phone would start glitching then the power would drop down like 20% when i opened the app. My phone would start over heating and shut off. Every time my phone would shut off it would take AT LEAST an hour to come back on even if it was on the charger. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! NOT WORTH IT!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: this app is hOrrible i went to a rally and everyone was throwing orange skin flakes from donald trumps face in my ear holes then the trumpets and pro nazi people were earning points by land them behind my ears afterwords the app spammed me with images of obama kissing sonic then i got my up adress sent to me while i was watching people at home depot by watermelons then in my sleep donald trump came into my house and sprinkled cheetos dust on my forehead and whispered bye bye boo boo now i'm cursed with sharpness IV from minecraft and the app forced me to talk to melanoma trump but now a deformed cheeto constantly follows me around
attributes.title: ewewewewewewew

attributes.review: Hello I put my debit card information to help donate to the trump administration and I started getting charges for pornography and xx small sized condoms?? It was crazy I had dispute the charges and call my capital one and explain to them that I was NOT xx small. After all of this I wasnâ€™t even able to donate to the trump administration because after I put in my bank info and sent in a picture of my drivers license to â€œwin cool rewardsâ€ I got denied because I wasnâ€™t of Caucasian descent! Disgusting. Anyways vote Jo Jorgensen 2020
attributes.title: This app stole my debit card information!

attributes.review: i am so upset by this app! i cannot even begin to explain how terrible it is. i have a new phone and everything was fine before i downloaded this app. suddenly afterwards, my phone will not stop glitching. my camera keeps taking random pictures and videos and i think the president is spying on me thru the app!!! or maybe even thru my microwave, i would not put it past him. i am HORRIFIED and DISGUSTED. will never download this again and i highly suggest u do not either. if i could leave less than one star i WOULD!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review: So yesterday I downloaded the app and I downloaded it on a tablet my friend went to the store to get some pickles and it gave me an idea to make my own store so I put it in my notes and I made my story like roblox and then the app put my store up for adoption so  my dinosaur by the store and turned it into a horse range with ice cream and no space for my pickle jars so now my donkey and me are both constipated and we are falling off of bridges so thatâ€™s why this app stole my onions never again am I ever downloading another app that steals anything for me
attributes.title: This app stole my store

Like supercalifraglisticexpialiadocous just let me burn my window in peace! All day I kept getting notification and my pet alligator got so annoyed he almost broke my phone. This app spreads so much fake news. Itâ€™s faker than Madison Beers nose! This app really wants to make me throw my phone out the window for the hippos and dinosaurs to eat. I need to get back to sewing my plants after I delete this horrible app.

attributes.title: DEAR bunker boy,

attributes.review: This app is horrible. It runs slowly and glitches ALL THE TIME. I was minding my own business, just trying to scroll through the app, when suddenly the big orange man summoned a horde of bees to come and eat me! The bees flew out of my phone and attacked me, leaving me injured and scarred for life. Plus, a man on the app kept contacting me and trying to get me to do the â€œBlue Whale Challenge.â€ It was crazy and incredibly offensive. On top of ALL OF THAT, demonic noises were coming from the app and they made me feel unsafe and depressed. This app is disgusting and I hope it gets deleted.
attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP
